"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5585298f6368724295003484#post_5585298f6368724295003484
Yeah. SJWs are weird.

...You should totally read One-punch man if you haven't already.

It's a manga series about what's possibly the strongest man in the universe. Able to beat any threat with one blow...And he's just a normal guy who decided to become a Superhero for a hobby.
